snippet: Orlando Orea, the man suspected in the slashing death of Michael Jones on a Manhattan sidewalk, left a note before fleeing to Mexico, Commissioner Raymond W. Kelly said.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and COLIN MOYNIHAN

lead_paragraph: Orlando Orea, the man suspected in the slashing death of Michael Jones on a Manhattan sidewalk, left a note before fleeing to Mexico, Commissioner Raymond W. Kelly said.

headline.seo: Suspect in Soccer Coach’s Killing Left Apology Note, Police Say
headline.main: Suspect in Soccer Coach’s Killing Left Apology, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Suspect in Soccer Coach’s Killing Left Apology, Police Say
